title: Switching Themes
description: Click the theme button (sun/moon icon) to switch between light and dark modes.
tip: Dark mode is great for low-light environments and saving your battery.
learnMore: Theme preferences are saved in your browser for next time.
imageAlt: Theme toggle button with sun/moon icon

title: Selecting a Checklist
description: Choose a checklist from the dropdown at the top to load inspection tasks.
tip: Checklists are named by inspection type, like ‘Safety’ or ‘Maintenance.’
learnMore: Checklists are loaded from CSV files stored locally on your device.

title: Entering Metadata
description: Fill in the date, team leader or manager, cleaner or team member, and unit fields. These appear in your PDF reports.
tip: Use a clear unit name, like ‘Kingfisher 14, K14 or Room 4,’ for easy reference.
learnMore: Metadata is included in the PDF header for each report.

title: Filling Out the Checklist
description: For each task, select ‘Y’ (Yes), ‘N’ (No), or ‘NA’ (Not Applicable). If you select ‘N,’ add a comment to explain why. You can also add a comment if you choose 'Y', just click 'Add Comment'.
tip: Comments help explain issues, like ‘Needs repair’ for a failed task.
learnMore: Your answers are saved in browser storage when you add a report.

title: Adding to Report
description: Click ‘Add to Report,’ then draw your signature to save the checklist to your reports.
tip: Make sure all fields are filled, or you’ll see an error.
learnMore: Your signature is saved as a PNG image with the report data.
imageAlt: Add to Report button and signature pad

title: Managing Reports
description: View saved reports in the list below. Click ‘Delete’ to remove a report.
tip: Check the date and unit to find the right report.
learnMore: Reports are stored in local browser storage as JSON data.
imageAlt: List of saved reports with delete buttons

title: Exporting PDFs
description: Click ‘Export All Reports as PDF’ to save reports as PDF files with a table layout.
tip: Each PDF includes a table of contents and your signature.
learnMore: PDFs use a table format: Section | Task | Value | Comment.
imageAlt: Export All Reports as PDF button

title: Sharing Reports
description: Click ‘Share All Reports’ to generate PDFs and open your email app to send them.
tip: Attach the PDFs from your downloads folder to the email.
learnMore: The email app opens with a pre-filled subject and body.

title: Saving Progress
description: Click ‘Save Progress’ to store your checklist answers for later.
tip: Use this if you can’t finish the checklist in one go.
learnMore: Progress is saved in local storage and tied to the checklist ID.

title: Loading Progress
description: Click ‘Load Progress’ to resume a saved checklist.
tip: Make sure you’re on the same checklist you saved.
learnMore: Only progress for the current checklist can be loaded.
